title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
00:05 <DrLou> Which version/package of Eclipse should I be using for best integration with xWiki?  
00:06 <@cjdelisle> The guy who knows about eclipse integration isn't here now.  
00:06 <@cjdelisle> I use gedit myself.  
00:06 <DrLou> Would like to use latest (Indigo), docs indicate we should use (at minimum?) Ganymede. Or \_only\_ Ganymede?  
00:07 <@cjdelisle> \*shrug\* I'd give it a try.  
00:07 <DrLou> Eclipse will become more of our environment in the next few months...  I'd like the idea of everything integrated.  
01:11 <DrLou> Friends, where are things like 'skins' and 'themes' for xWiki?  
01:13 <@cjdelisle> http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Skins
